sentence: Reflection  I have encountered many problems when redesigning.
I wanted to do something fancy with electricity, but it turned out to be lack of resources and capability, so I turned to something simple but more aesthetic and conceptual.
As for the reading, the author mentions the difference between innovation and repair.
Innovation, to people, is something new and fancy, while repair seems to be not as creative.
From this project, I would say, repair is also a innovative process, and sometimes can advance the original design.
